Chromia - Special Ops

  1. Let’s say I reveal one white battle icon during Chromia’s attack. Then I flip another white battle icon
    in the two bonus cards. Will her ability trigger?     [Source: WotC]
    Yes. For any ability that looks at what battle icons you flipped, flip your two bonus cards before
    checking if that ability triggers or not.
  2. While playing Chromia, you trigger her ability by flipping 2 white icons for your first 2 battle card flips, is that when your draw into hand happens? Or do you continue your battle flips then take your draw into hand? [Source: WotC]
    Resolve all of the flips and then draw into your hand.
